page.content: CAFE.NO PERSON UNDER THE AGE OF 18 IS ALLOWED IN THERE.IT IS USED FOR ALL SPORTS BETTING.{ {J.M.F VIDEO SHOP THIS IS SITUATED TWO DOORS AWAY FROM THE BETTING OFFICE.IT IS ALSO ON CASTLE STREET.THE OWNER OF J.M.F VIDEO IS MR MARK FINCHETT.PEOPLE WITH VIDEO RECORDERS CAN HIRE A VIDEO CASSETTE FOR Â£1.00 PER NIGHT.IT HIRES TAPES FOR ALL AGES e.g THE WALT DISNEY FAVOURITESi.e JUNGLE BOOK,E.T,etc TO HORROR MOVIES &THRILLERS. {FISH & CHIP SHOP} THIS IS QUITE A LARGE SHOP ON CASTLE STREET. IT IS OWNED BY MR FINCHER.IT IS OPEN LATE AT NIGHT 6 DAYS A WEEK.IT SELLS FRIED FISH,SAUSAGES,BEEFBURGERS, CHICKEN,CHIPS,PEAS,BEANS AND A SELECTION OF DRINKS TOO!
